channel.title: Comments on: Not Another Bitcoin Podcast #14: Chris Rice

item.title: By: kenn bosak
item.dc:creator: kenn bosak
item.description: i think he meant that binance has a decentralized market like BNB trading but yeah its not truly decentralized. But, still my favorite exchange. and yes A, i'm smoking... Thanks for the support DIGITALCURRENT.
item.content:encoded: i think he meant that binance has a decentralized market like BNB trading but yeah its not truly decentralized. But, still my favorite exchange. and yes A, i’m smoking… Thanks for the support DIGITALCURRENT.

item.title: By: DIGITALCURRENT
item.dc:creator: DIGITALCURRENT
item.description: Also, really love your content Kenn. Thank you for what you do.
item.content:encoded: Also, really love your content Kenn. Thank you for what you do.

item.title: By: DIGITALCURRENT
item.dc:creator: DIGITALCURRENT
item.description: YOUR GUEST MENTIONS BINANCE AS BEING A DECENTRALIZED EXCHANGE. IT'S NOT. IT'S CENTRALIZED.
item.content:encoded: YOUR GUEST MENTIONS BINANCE AS BEING A DECENTRALIZED EXCHANGE. IT’S NOT. IT’S CENTRALIZED.
